   16: -module(ejabberdctl_SUITE).
   17: -compile(export_all).
   18: 
   19: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   20: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -import(ejabberdctl_helper, [ejabberdctl/3, rpc_call/3]).
   25: -import(mongoose_helper, [auth_modules/0]).
   26: -import(ejabberd_node_utils, [mim/0]).
   27: 
   28: -define(SINGLE_QUOTE_CHAR, $\').
   29: -define(DOUBLE_QUOTE_CHAR, $\").
   30: 
   31: -record(offline_msg, {us, timestamp, expire, from, to, packet}).
   32: 
   33: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   34: %% Suite configuration
   35: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   36: 
   37: all() ->
   38:     [{group, accounts},
   39:      {group, sessions},
   40:      {group, vcard},
   41:      {group, roster},
   42:      {group, roster_advanced},
   43:      {group, last},
   44:      {group, private},
   45:      {group, stanza},
   46:      {group, stats},
   47:      {group, basic}].
   48: 
   49: groups() ->
   50:      [{accounts, [sequence], accounts()},
   51:       {sessions, [sequence], sessions()},
   52:       {vcard, [sequence], vcard()},
   53:       {roster, [sequence], roster()},
   54:       {last, [sequence], last()},
   55:       {private, [sequence], private()},
   56:       {stanza, [sequence], stanza()},
   57:       {roster_advanced, [sequence], roster_advanced()},
   58:       {basic, [sequence], basic()},
   59:       {stats, [sequence], stats()}].
   60: 
   61: basic() ->
   62:     [simple_register, simple_unregister, register_twice,
   63:         backup_restore_mnesia,
   64:         restore_mnesia_wrong,
   65:         dump_and_load,
   66:         load_mnesia_wrong,
   67:         dump_table,
   68:         get_loglevel,
   69:         remove_old_messages_test,
   70:         remove_expired_messages_test
   71:     ].
   72: 
   73: accounts() -> [change_password, check_password_hash, check_password,
   74:                check_account, ban_account, num_active_users, delete_old_users,
   75:                delete_old_users_vhost].
   76: 
   77: sessions() -> [num_resources_num, kick_session, status,
   78:                sessions_info, set_presence].
   79: 
   80: vcard() -> [vcard_rw, vcard2_rw, vcard2_multi_rw].
   81: 
   82: roster() -> [rosteritem_rw, presence_after_add_rosteritem,
   83:              push_roster,
   84:              push_roster_all,
   85:              push_roster_alltoall].
   86: 
   87: roster_advanced() ->[process_rosteritems_list_simple,
   88:                           process_rosteritems_list_nomatch,
   89:                           process_rosteritems_list_advanced1,
   90:                           process_rosteritems_list_advanced2,
   91:                           process_rosteritems_delete_advanced,
   92:                           process_rosteritems_delete_advanced2].
   93: 
   94: last() -> [set_last].
   95: 
   96: private() -> [private_rw].
   97: 
   98: stanza() -> [send_message, send_message_wrong_jid, send_stanza, send_stanzac2s_wrong].
   99: 
  100: stats() -> [stats_global, stats_host].
  101: 
  102: suite() ->
  103:     escalus:suite().
  104: 
  105: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  106:     Cwd0 = escalus_config:get_config(data_dir, Config),
  107:     CwdTokens = string:tokens(Cwd0, "/"),
  108:     Cwd =  [$/ | string:join(lists:sublist(CwdTokens, 1, length(CwdTokens)-2), "/")],
  109:     TemplatePath = Cwd ++ "/roster.template",
  110:     start_mod_admin_extra(),
  111:     AuthMods = auth_modules(),
  112:     Node = mim(),
  113:     Config1 = ejabberd_node_utils:init(Node, Config),
  114:     Config2 = escalus:init_per_suite([{ctl_auth_mods, AuthMods},
  115:                                         {roster_template, TemplatePath} | Config1]),
  116:     escalus:create_users(Config2, escalus:get_users([alice, mike, bob, kate])).
  117: 
  118: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  119:     Config1 = lists:keydelete(ctl_auth_mods, 1, Config),
  120:     delete_users(Config1),
  121:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config1).
  122: 
  123: init_per_group(vcard, Config) ->
  124:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod,get_module_opt,
  125:                               [ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  126:                                mod_vcard, backend, mnesia]) of
  127:         ldap ->
  128:             {skip, vcard_set_not_supported_with_ldap};
  129:         _ ->
  130:             Config
  131:     end;
  132: 
  133: init_per_group(roster_advanced, Config) ->
  134:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod,get_module_opt,[ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain), mod_roster, backend, mnesia]) of
  135:         mnesia ->
  136:             Config;
  137:         _ ->
  138:             {skip, command_process_rosteritems_supports_only_mnesia}
  139:     end;
  140: 
  141: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  142:     Config.
  143: 
  144: end_per_group(Rosters, Config) when (Rosters == roster) or (Rosters == roster_advanced) ->
  145:     TemplatePath = escalus_config:get_config(roster_template, Config),
  146:     RegUsers = [atom_to_list(U) || {U, _} <- escalus_config:get_config(escalus_users, Config)],
  147:     {ok, [Roster]} = file:consult(TemplatePath),
  148:     io:format("Roster is ~p~n and registred is ~p",[Roster, RegUsers]),
  149:     C = fun({U, S, _, _}) ->
  150:         case lists:member(U, RegUsers) of
  151:             true ->
  152:                 SB = string_to_binary(S),
  153:                 UB = string_to_binary(U),
  154:                 escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_hooks, run, [remove_user, SB, [UB, SB]]);
  155:             _ ->
  156:                ok
  157:         end
  158:     end,
  159:     lists:foreach(C, Roster),
  160:     Config;
  161: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  162:     Config.
  163: 
  164: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config)
  165:   % these cases are incompatible with domainless odbc schema
  166:   when CaseName == delete_old_users_vhost
  167:        orelse CaseName == stats_global
  168:        orelse CaseName == stats_host ->
  169:     {_, AuthMods} = lists:keyfind(ctl_auth_mods, 1, Config),
  170:     case lists:member(ejabberd_auth_odbc, AuthMods) orelse
  171:          lists:member(ejabberd_auth_ldap, AuthMods) of
  172:         true -> {skip, vhost_odbc_incompatible};
  173:         false -> escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config)
  174:     end;
  175: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config)
  176:     when CaseName == check_password_hash;
  177:          CaseName == delete_old_users ->
  178:     {_, AuthMods} = lists:keyfind(ctl_auth_mods, 1, Config),
  179:     case lists:member(ejabberd_auth_ldap, AuthMods) of
  180:         true -> {skip, not_fully_supported_with_ldap};
  181:         false -> escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config)
  182:     end;
  183: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  184:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  185: 
  186: end_per_testcase(delete_old_users, Config) ->
  187:     Users = escalus_users:get_users([alice, bob, kate, mike]),
  188:     lists:foreach(fun({_User, UserSpec}) ->
  189:                 {Username, Domain, Pass} = get_user_data(UserSpec, Config),
  190:                 escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, try_register, [Username, Domain, Pass])
  191:         end, Users),
  192:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config),
  193:     escalus:end_per_testcase(delete_old_users, Config);
  194: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  195:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config),
  196:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  197: 
  198: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  199: %% mod_admin_extra_accounts tests
  200: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  201: 
  202: change_password(Config) ->
  203:     {User, Domain, OldPassword} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  204:     ejabberdctl("change_password", [User, Domain, <<OldPassword/binary, $2>>], Config),
  205:     {error, {connection_step_failed, _, _}} = escalus_client:start_for(Config, alice, <<"newres">>),
  206:     ejabberdctl("change_password", [User, Domain, OldPassword], Config),
  207:     {ok, _Alice2} = escalus_client:start_for(Config, alice, <<"newres2">>).
  208: 
  209: check_password_hash(Config) ->
  210:     {User, Domain, Pass} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  211:     MD5Hash = get_md5(Pass),
  212:     MD5HashBad = get_md5(<<Pass/binary, "bad">>),
  213:     SHAHash = get_sha(Pass),
  214: 
  215:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("check_password_hash", [User, Domain, MD5Hash, "md5"], Config),
  216:     {_, ErrCode} = ejabberdctl("check_password_hash", [User, Domain, MD5HashBad, "md5"], Config),
  217:     true = (ErrCode =/= 0), %% Must return code other than 0
  218:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("check_password_hash", [User, Domain, SHAHash, "sha"], Config).
  219: 
  220: check_password(Config) ->
  221:     {User, Domain, Pass} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  222: 
  223:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("check_password", [User, Domain, Pass], Config),
  224:     {_, ErrCode} = ejabberdctl("check_password", [User, Domain, <<Pass/binary, "Bad">>], Config),
  225:     true = (ErrCode =/= 0). %% Must return code other than 0
  226: 
  227: check_account(Config) ->
  228:     {User, Domain, _Pass} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  229: 
  230:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("check_account", [User, Domain], Config),
  231:     {_, ErrCode} = ejabberdctl("check_account", [<<User/binary, "Bad">>, Domain], Config),
  232:     true = (ErrCode =/= 0). %% Must return code other than 0
  233: 
  234: ban_account(Config) ->
  235:     {User, Domain, Pass} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  236: 
  237:     {ok, Mike} = escalus_client:start_for(Config, mike, <<"newres">>),
  238:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("ban_account", [User, Domain, "SomeReason"], Config),
  239:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"conflict">>, <<"SomeReason">>], escalus:wait_for_stanza(Mike)),
  240:     {error, {connection_step_failed, _, _}} = escalus_client:start_for(Config, mike, <<"newres2">>),
  241:     ejabberdctl("change_password", [User, Domain, Pass], Config).
  242: 
  243: num_active_users(Config) ->
  244:     {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  245:     {MikeName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  246: 
  247:     {Mega, Secs, _} = erlang:now(),
  248:     Now = Mega*1000000+Secs,
  249:     set_last(AliceName, Domain, Now),
  250:     set_last(MikeName, Domain, Now - 864000), %% Now - 10 days
  251:     {"1\n", _} = ejabberdctl("num_active_users", [Domain, "5"], Config).
  252: 
  253: delete_old_users(Config) ->
  254:     {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  255:     {BobName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  256:     {KateName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(kate, Config),
  257:     {MikeName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  258: 
  259:     {Mega, Secs, _} = erlang:now(),
  260:     Now = Mega*1000000+Secs,
  261:     set_last(AliceName, Domain, Now),
  262:     set_last(BobName, Domain, Now),
  263:     set_last(MikeName, Domain, Now),
  264: 
  265:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_old_users", ["10"], Config),
  266:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("check_account", [AliceName, Domain], Config),
  267:     {_, ErrCode} = ejabberdctl("check_account", [KateName, Domain], Config),
  268:     true = (ErrCode =/= 0). %% Must return code other than 0
  269: 
  270: delete_old_users_vhost(Config) ->
  271:     {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  272:     {KateName, Domain, KatePass} = get_user_data(kate, Config),
  273:     SecDomain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_secondary_domain, Config),
  274: 
  275:     {Mega, Secs, _} = erlang:now(),
  276:     Now = Mega*1000000+Secs,
  277:     set_last(AliceName, Domain, Now-86400*30),
  278: 
  279:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("register", [KateName, SecDomain, KatePass], Config),
  280:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("check_account", [KateName, SecDomain], Config),
  281:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_old_users_vhost", [SecDomain, "10"], Config),
  282:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("check_account", [AliceName, Domain], Config),
  283:     {_, ErrCode} = ejabberdctl("check_account", [KateName, SecDomain], Config),
  284:     true = (ErrCode =/= 0). %% Must return code other than 0
  285: 
  286: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  287: %% mod_admin_extra_accounts tests
  288: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  289: 
  290: %% Checks both num_resources and resource_num
  291: num_resources_num(Config) ->
  292:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 3}, {bob, 1}], fun(_, Alice2, _, _) ->
  293:                 {Username, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  294:                 ResName = binary_to_list(escalus_client:resource(Alice2)) ++ "\n",
  295: 
  296:                 {"3\n", _} = ejabberdctl("num_resources", [Username, Domain], Config),
  297:                 {ResName, _} = ejabberdctl("resource_num", [Username, Domain, "2"], Config)
  298:         end).
  299: 
  300: kick_session(Config) ->
  301:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  302:                 Username = escalus_client:username(Alice),
  303:                 Domain = escalus_client:server(Alice),
  304:                 Resource = escalus_client:resource(Alice),
  305: 
  306:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("kick_session", [Username, Domain, Resource, "\"Because I can!\""], Config),
  307:                 Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  308:                 escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"conflict">>, <<"Because I can!">>], Stanza)
  309:         end).
  310: 
  311: status(Config) ->
  312:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {mike, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(User1, User2, User3) ->
  313:                 PriDomain = escalus_client:server(User1),
  314:                 SecDomain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_secondary_domain, Config),
  315:                 AwayPresence = escalus_stanza:presence_show(<<"away">>),
  316:                 escalus_client:send(User2, AwayPresence),
  317: 
  318:                 {"2\n", _} = ejabberdctl("status_num", ["available"], Config),
  319: 
  320:                 {"2\n", _} = ejabberdctl("status_num_host", [PriDomain, "available"], Config),
  321:                 {"0\n", _} = ejabberdctl("status_num_host", [SecDomain, "available"], Config),
  322: 
  323:                 {StatusList, _} = ejabberdctl("status_list", ["available"], Config),
  324:                 match_user_status([User1, User3], StatusList),
  325: 
  326:                 {StatusList2, _} = ejabberdctl("status_list_host", [PriDomain, "available"], Config),
  327:                 match_user_status([User1, User3], StatusList2),
  328:                 {[], _} = ejabberdctl("status_list_host", [SecDomain, "available"], Config)
  329:         end).
  330: 
  331: sessions_info(Config) ->
  332:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(User1, User2, User3) ->
  333:                 Username1 = escalus_client:username(User1),
  334:                 PriDomain = escalus_client:server(User1),
  335:                 SecDomain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_secondary_domain, Config),
  336:                 AwayPresence = escalus_stanza:presence_show(<<"away">>),
  337:                 escalus_client:send(User2, AwayPresence),
  338: 
  339:                 {UserList, _} = ejabberdctl("connected_users_info", [], Config),
  340:                 match_user_info([User1, User2, User3], UserList),
  341: 
  342:                 {UserList2, _} = ejabberdctl("connected_users_vhost", [PriDomain], Config),
  343:                 match_user_info([User1, User2, User3], UserList2),
  344:                 {[], _} = ejabberdctl("connected_users_vhost", [SecDomain], Config),
  345: 
  346:                 {UserList3, _} = ejabberdctl("user_sessions_info", [Username1, PriDomain], Config),
  347:                 match_user_info([User1], UserList3)
  348:         end).
  349: 
  350: set_presence(Config) ->
  351:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  352:                 Username = escalus_client:username(Alice),
  353:                 Domain = escalus_client:server(Alice),
  354:                 Resource = escalus_client:resource(Alice),
  355: 
  356:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("set_presence", [Username, Domain, Resource,
  357:                                                       "available", "away", "mystatus", "10"], Config),
  358:                 Presence = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  359:                 escalus:assert(is_presence_with_show, [<<"away">>], Presence),
  360:                 escalus:assert(is_presence_with_status, [<<"mystatus">>], Presence),
  361:                 escalus:assert(is_presence_with_priority, [<<"10">>], Presence)
  362:         end).
  363: 
  364: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  365: %% mod_admin_extra_vcard tests
  366: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  367: 
  368: vcard_rw(Config) ->
  369:     {Username, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  370: 
  371:     {_, ExitCode} = ejabberdctl("get_vcard", [Username, Domain, "NICKNAME"], Config),
  372:     true = (ExitCode /= 0),
  373: 
  374:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("set_vcard", [Username, Domain, "NICKNAME", "SomeNickname"], Config),
  375:     {"SomeNickname\n", 0} = ejabberdctl("get_vcard", [Username, Domain, "NICKNAME"], Config).
  376: 
  377: vcard2_rw(Config) ->
  378:     {Username, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  379: 
  380:     {_, ExitCode} = ejabberdctl("get_vcard2", [Username, Domain, "ORG", "ORGNAME"], Config),
  381:     true = (ExitCode /= 0),
  382: 
  383:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("set_vcard2", [Username, Domain, "ORG", "ORGNAME", "ESL"], Config),
  384:     {"ESL\n", 0} = ejabberdctl("get_vcard2", [Username, Domain, "ORG", "ORGNAME"], Config).
  385: 
  386: vcard2_multi_rw(Config) ->
  387:     {Username, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  388: 
  389:     {_, ExitCode} = ejabberdctl("get_vcard2_multi", [Username, Domain, "ORG", "ORGUNIT"], Config),
  390:     true = (ExitCode /= 0),
  391: 
  392:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("set_vcard2_multi", [Username, Domain, "ORG", "ORGUNIT", "'sales;marketing'"], Config),
  393:     {OrgUnits0, 0} = ejabberdctl("get_vcard2_multi", [Username, Domain, "ORG", "ORGUNIT"], Config),
  394:     OrgUnits = string:tokens(OrgUnits0, "\n"),
  395:     2 = length(OrgUnits),
  396:     true = (lists:member("sales", OrgUnits) andalso lists:member("marketing", OrgUnits)).
  397: 
  398: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  399: %% mod_admin_extra_vcard tests
  400: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  401: 
  402: rosteritem_rw(Config) ->
  403:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  404:                 {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  405:                 {BobName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  406:                 {MikeName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  407: 
  408:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName,
  409:                                                         Domain, "MyBob", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  410:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName,
  411:                                                         Domain, "\"My Mike\"", "\'My Group\'", "both"], Config),
  412: 
  413:                 [Push1, Push2] = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2), % Check roster broadcasts
  414:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_set, Push1),
  415:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [bob], Push1),
  416:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_set, Push2),
  417:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [mike], Push2),
  418: 
  419:                 {Items1, 0} = ejabberdctl("get_roster", [AliceName, Domain], Config),
  420:                 match_roster([{BobName, Domain, "MyBob", "MyGroup", "both"},
  421:                               {MikeName, Domain, "MyMike", "MyGroup", "both"}], Items1),
  422: 
  423:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  424:                 Roster1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  425:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_result, Roster1),
  426:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [bob], Roster1),
  427:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [mike], Roster1),
  428: 
  429:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName, Domain], Config),
  430: 
  431:                 Push3 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  432:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_set, Push3),
  433:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [bob], Push3),
  434: 
  435:                 {Items2, 0} = ejabberdctl("get_roster", [AliceName, Domain], Config),
  436:                 match_roster([{MikeName, Domain, "MyMike", "MyGroup", "both"}], Items2),
  437: 
  438:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_remove_contact(mike))  % cleanup
  439:         end).
  440: 
  441: presence_after_add_rosteritem(Config) ->
  442:      escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob,1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  443:                  {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  444:                  {BobName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  445: 
  446:                  {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName,
  447:                                                          Domain, "MyBob", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  448: 
  449:                  escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  450:                  escalus:assert(is_presence, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  451: 
  452:                  escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_remove_contact(bob))  % cleanup
  453:          end).
  454: 
  455: push_roster(Config) ->
  456:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  457:                 {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  458:                 TemplatePath = escalus_config:get_config(roster_template, Config),
  459: 
  460:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("push_roster", [TemplatePath, AliceName, Domain], Config),
  461:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  462:                 Roster1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  463:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_result, Roster1),
  464:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [bob], Roster1),
  465: 
  466:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_remove_contact(bob)) % cleanup
  467:         end).
  468: 
  469: process_rosteritems_list_simple(Config) ->
  470:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  471:         %% given
  472:         Action = "list",
  473:         Subs = "any",
  474:         Asks = "any",
  475:         User = escalus_client:short_jid(Alice),
  476:         Contact =string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob))),
  477:         {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  478:         {BobName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  479:         %% when
  480:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName, Domain, "MyBob", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  481:         S = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  482:         {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("process_rosteritems", [Action, Subs, Asks, User, Contact], Config),
  483:         %% then
  484:         {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++Contact++".*"),
  485:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName, Domain], Config)
  486:     end).
  487: 
  488: process_rosteritems_list_nomatch(Config) ->
  489:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  490:         %% given
  491:         Action = "list",
  492:         Subs = "from:both",
  493:         Asks = "any",
  494:         User = escalus_client:short_jid(Alice),
  495:         Contact =string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob))),
  496:         {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  497:         {BobName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  498:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName,
  499:                                                 Domain, "MyBob", "MyGroup", "to"], Config),
  500:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  501:         %% when
  502:         {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("process_rosteritems", [Action, Subs, Asks, User, Contact], Config),
  503:         %% then
  504:         nomatch = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++Contact++".*"),
  505:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName, Domain], Config)
  506:     end).
  507: 
  508: process_rosteritems_list_advanced1(Config) ->
  509:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {mike, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Mike, Kate) ->
  510:         %% given
  511:         Action = "list",
  512:         Subs = "from:both",
  513:         Asks = "any",
  514:         User = escalus_client:short_jid(Alice),
  515:         {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  516:         {MikeName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  517:         {KateName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(kate, Config),
  518:         ContactMike = string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Mike))),
  519:         ContactKate= string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Kate))),
  520:         ContactsRegexp = ContactMike ++ ":" ++ string:substr(binary_to_list(KateName), 1, 2) ++ ".*@.*",
  521: 
  522:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName,
  523:                                                 Domain, "DearMike", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  524:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName,
  525:                                                 Domain, "BestFriend", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  526:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice,4),
  527:         %% when
  528:         {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("process_rosteritems", [Action, Subs, Asks, User, ContactsRegexp], Config),
  529:         %% then
  530:         {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++ContactMike++".*"),
  531:         {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++ContactKate++".*"),
  532:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName, Domain], Config),
  533:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName, Domain], Config)
  534:     end).
  535: 
  536: process_rosteritems_delete_advanced(Config) ->
  537:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {mike, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Mike, Kate) ->
  538:         %% given
  539:         Action = "delete",
  540:         Subs = "from",
  541:         Asks = "any",
  542:         User = escalus_client:short_jid(Alice),
  543:         {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  544:         {MikeName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  545:         {KateName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(kate, Config),
  546:         ContactMike = string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Mike))),
  547:         ContactKate= string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Kate))),
  548:         ContactsRegexp = ".*" ++ string:substr(ContactMike, 3) ++
  549:                            ":" ++ string:substr(ContactKate, 1,2) ++"@" ++ binary_to_list(Domain),
  550:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName,
  551:                                                 Domain, "DearMike", "MyGroup", "from"], Config),
  552:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName,
  553:                                                 Domain, "Friend", "MyGroup", "from"], Config),
  554:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice,4),
  555:         %% when
  556:         {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("process_rosteritems", [Action, Subs, Asks, User, ContactsRegexp], Config),
  557:         %% then
  558:         {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++ContactMike++".*"),
  559:         nomatch = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++ContactKate++".*"),
  560:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName, Domain], Config),
  561:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName, Domain], Config)
  562:     end).
  563: 
  564: process_rosteritems_list_advanced2(Config) ->
  565:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {mike, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Mike, Kate) ->
  566:         %% given
  567:         Action = "list",
  568:         Subs = "any",
  569:         Asks = "any",
  570:         User = escalus_client:short_jid(Alice),
  571:         {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  572:         {MikeName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  573:         {KateName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(kate, Config),
  574:         ContactMike = string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Mike))),
  575:         ContactKate= string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Kate))),
  576:         ContactsRegexp = ".*e@lo.*",
  577:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName,
  578:                                                 Domain, "DearMike", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  579:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName,
  580:                                                 Domain, "KateFromSchool", "MyGroup", "from"], Config),
  581:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice,4),
  582:         %% when
  583:         {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("process_rosteritems", [Action, Subs, Asks, User, ContactsRegexp], Config),
  584:         %% then
  585:         {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++ContactMike++".*"),
  586:         {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++ContactKate++".*"),
  587:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName, Domain], Config),
  588:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName, Domain], Config)
  589:     end).
  590: 
  591: process_rosteritems_delete_advanced2(Config) ->
  592:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {mike, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Mike, Kate) ->
  593:         %% given
  594:         Action = "delete",
  595:         Subs = "to:from",
  596:         Asks = "any",
  597:         User = "'al.c[e]@.*host:((b[o]b)|(mike))@loc.*t2'",
  598:         {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  599:         {BobName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  600:         {MikeName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  601:         {KateName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(kate, Config),
  602:         ContactMike = string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Mike))),
  603:         ContactKate= string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Kate))),
  604:         ContactBob= string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob))),
  605:         ContactsReg = "'.ik[ea]@localho+.*:k@loc.*st:(alice)+@.*:no'",
  606:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName,
  607:                                                 Domain, "DearMike", "MyGroup", "to"], Config),
  608:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName,
  609:                                                 Domain, "HateHerSheHasSoNiceLegs", "MyGroup", "to"], Config),
  610:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [BobName, Domain, AliceName,
  611:                                                 Domain, "Girlfriend", "MyGroup", "from"], Config),
  612:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice,4),
  613:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
  614:         %% when
  615:         {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("process_rosteritems", [Action, Subs, Asks, User, ContactsReg], Config),
  616:         %% then
  617:         {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*" ++ ContactMike ++ ".*"),
  618:         nomatch = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*" ++ ContactKate ++ ".*"),
  619:         nomatch = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*" ++ ContactBob ++ ".*"),
  620:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName, Domain], Config),
  621:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName, Domain], Config),
  622:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [BobName, Domain, AliceName, Domain], Config)
  623:     end).
  624: 
  625: push_roster_all(Config) ->
  626:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob,1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  627:                 TemplatePath = escalus_config:get_config(roster_template, Config),
  628: 
  629:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("push_roster_all", [TemplatePath], Config),
  630: 
  631:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  632:                 Roster1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  633:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_result, Roster1),
  634:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [bob], Roster1),
  635: 
  636:                 escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  637:                 Roster2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  638:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_result, Roster2),
  639:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [alice], Roster2),
  640: 
  641:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_remove_contact(bob)), % cleanup
  642:                 escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:roster_remove_contact(alice)) % cleanup
  643:         end).
  644: 
  645: push_roster_alltoall(Config) ->
  646:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  647:                 {_, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  648: 
  649:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("push_roster_alltoall", [Domain, "MyGroup"], Config),
  650: 
  651:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  652:                 Roster = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  653: 
  654:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_result, Roster),
  655:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [bob], Roster),
  656:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [mike], Roster),
  657:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [kate], Roster)
  658:         end).
  659: 
  660: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  661: %% mod_admin_extra_last tests
  662: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  663: 
  664: set_last(Config) ->
  665:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  666:                 {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  667:                 {BobName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  668: 
  669:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName,
  670:                                                         Domain, "MyBob", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  671:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [BobName, Domain, AliceName,
  672:                                                         Domain, "MyAlice", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  673: 
  674:                 escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice), % ignore push
  675: 
  676:                 Now = usec:to_sec(usec:from_now(erlang:now())),
  677:                 TS = integer_to_list(Now - 7200),
  678:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("set_last", [BobName, Domain, TS, "Status"], Config),
  679:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:last_activity(bob)),
  680:                 LastAct = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  681:                 escalus:assert(is_last_result, LastAct),
  682:                 Seconds = list_to_integer(binary_to_list(
  683:                             exml_query:path(LastAct, [{element, <<"query">>}, {attr, <<"seconds">>}]))),
  684:                 true = (( (Seconds > 7100) andalso (Seconds < 7300) ) orelse Seconds),
  685: 
  686:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName, Domain], Config), % cleanup
  687:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [BobName, Domain, AliceName, Domain], Config)
  688:         end).
  689: 
  690: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  691: %% mod_admin_extra_private tests
  692: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  693: 
  694: private_rw(Config) ->
  695:     {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  696:     XmlEl1 = "'<secretinfo xmlns=\"nejmspejs\">1</secretinfo>'",
  697:     XmlEl2 = "'<secretinfo xmlns=\"inny\">2</secretinfo>'",
  698: 
  699:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("private_set", [AliceName, Domain, XmlEl1], Config),
  700:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("private_set", [AliceName, Domain, XmlEl2], Config),
  701: 
  702:     {Result, 0} = ejabberdctl("private_get", [AliceName, Domain, "secretinfo", "nejmspejs"], Config),
  703:     {ok, #xmlel{ name = <<"secretinfo">>, attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"nejmspejs">>}],
  704:                 children = [#xmlcdata{ content = <<"1">> }]}} = exml:parse(list_to_binary(Result)).
  705: 
  706: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  707: %% mod_admin_extra_stanza tests
  708: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  709: 
  710: send_message(Config) ->
  711:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 2}], fun(Alice, Bob1, Bob2) ->
  712:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("send_message_chat", [escalus_client:full_jid(Alice),
  713:                                                            escalus_client:full_jid(Bob1),
  714:                                                            "\"Hi Bob!\""], Config),
  715:                 Stanza1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob1),
  716:                 escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi Bob!">>], Stanza1),
  717: 
  718:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("send_message_headline", [escalus_client:full_jid(Alice),
  719:                                                                     escalus_client:short_jid(Bob1),
  720:                                                                     "Subj", "\"Hi Bob!!\""], Config),
  721:                 Stanza2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob1),
  722:                 Stanza3 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob2),
  723:                 escalus:assert(is_headline_message, [<<"Subj">>, <<"Hi Bob!!">>], Stanza2),
  724:                 escalus:assert(is_headline_message, [<<"Subj">>, <<"Hi Bob!!">>], Stanza3)
  725:         end).
  726: 
  727: send_message_wrong_jid(Config) ->
  728:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  729:         {_, Err1} = ejabberdctl("send_message_chat", ["'@@#$%!!.'",
  730:                                                    escalus_client:full_jid(Bob),
  731:                                                    "\"Hello bobby!\""], Config),
  732:         {_, Err2} = ejabberdctl("send_message_headline", ["'%%@&@&@==//\///'",
  733:                                                        escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
  734:                                                        "Subj", "\"Are
  735:                                                        you there?\""],
  736:                              Config),
  737:         true = Err1 =/= 0,
  738:         true = Err2 =/= 0,
  739:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
  740:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob)
  741:     end).
  742: 
  743: send_stanza(Config) ->
  744:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob,1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  745:                 Domain = escalus_client:server(Alice),
  746:                 Resource = escalus_client:resource(Alice),
  747:                 {BobName, _, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  748:                 BobJID = <<BobName/binary, $@, Domain/binary, $/, (escalus_client:resource(Bob))/binary>>,
  749: 
  750:                 Stanza = re:replace(exml:to_binary(escalus_stanza:from(escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, "Hi"), BobJID)),
  751:                                     <<?DOUBLE_QUOTE_CHAR>>, <<?SINGLE_QUOTE_CHAR>>, [global, {return, binary}]),
  752:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("send_stanza_c2s", [BobName, Domain, Resource, <<$\", Stanza/binary, $\">>], Config),
  753: 
  754:                 Message = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  755:                 escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi">>], Message),
  756:                 escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Bob], Message)
  757:         end).
  758: 
  759: send_stanzac2s_wrong(Config) ->
  760:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob,1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  761:         Domain = escalus_client:server(Alice),
  762:         Resource = escalus_client:resource(Alice),
  763:         WrongBobName = "bobby_the_great",
  764:         {BobName, _, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  765:         BobJID = <<BobName/binary, $@, Domain/binary, $/, (escalus_client:resource(Bob))/binary>>,
  766:         Stanza = re:replace(exml:to_binary(escalus_stanza:from(escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, "Hi"), BobJID)),
  767:                             <<?DOUBLE_QUOTE_CHAR>>, <<?SINGLE_QUOTE_CHAR>>, [global, {return, binary}]),
  768:         StanzaWrong = <<"<iq type='get' id='234234'><xmlns='wrongwrong'>">>,
  769:         {_, Err} = ejabberdctl("send_stanza_c2s", [WrongBobName, Domain, Resource, <<$\", Stanza/binary, $\">>],
  770:                                Config),
  771:         {_, Err2} = ejabberdctl("send_stanza_c2s", [BobName, Domain, Resource, <<$\", StanzaWrong/binary, $\">>],
  772:                                Config),
  773: 
  774:         true = Err =/= 0,
  775:         true = Err2 =/= 0,
  776:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  777:     end).
  778: 
  779: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  780: %% mod_admin_extra_stats tests
  781: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  782: 
  783: stats_global(Config) ->
  784:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob,1}], fun(_Alice, _Bob) ->
  785:                 RegisteredCount = length(escalus_config:get_config(escalus_users, Config, [])),
  786:                 Registered = integer_to_list(RegisteredCount) ++ "\n",
  787: 
  788:                 {UpTime, 0} = ejabberdctl("stats", ["uptimeseconds"], Config),
  789:                 _ = list_to_integer(string:strip(UpTime, both, $\n)),
  790:                 {Registered, 0} = ejabberdctl("stats", ["registeredusers"], Config),
  791: 
  792:                 {"2\n", 0} = ejabberdctl("stats", ["onlineusersnode"], Config),
  793: 
  794:                 {"2\n", 0} = ejabberdctl("stats", ["onlineusers"], Config)
  795:         end).
  796: 
  797: stats_host(Config) ->
  798:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob,1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  799:                 RegisteredCount = length(escalus_config:get_config(escalus_users, Config, [])),
  800:                 Registered = integer_to_list(RegisteredCount) ++ "\n",
  801: 
  802:                 PriDomain = escalus_client:server(Alice),
  803:                 SecDomain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_secondary_domain, Config),
  804: 
  805:                 {Registered, 0} = ejabberdctl("stats_host", ["registeredusers", PriDomain], Config),
  806:                 {"0\n", 0} = ejabberdctl("stats_host", ["registeredusers", SecDomain], Config),
  807: 
  808:                 {"2\n", 0} = ejabberdctl("stats_host", ["onlineusers", PriDomain], Config),
  809:                 {"0\n", 0} = ejabberdctl("stats_host", ["onlineusers", SecDomain], Config)
  810:         end).
  811: 
  812: 
  813: 
  814: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  815: %% Improve coverage
  816: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  817: 
  818: 
  819: 
  820: simple_register(Config) ->
  821:     %% given
  822:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  823:     {Name, Password} = {<<"tyler">>, <<"durden">>},
  824:     %% when
  825:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("register", [Name, Domain, Password], Config),
  826:     {R2, 0} = ejabberdctl("registered_users", [Domain], Config),
  827:     %% then
  828:     {match, _} = re:run(R2, ".*(" ++binary_to_list(Name)++").*").
  829: 
  830: simple_unregister(Config) ->
  831:     %% given
  832:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  833:     {Name, _} = {<<"tyler">>, <<"durden">>},
  834:     %% when
  835:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("unregister", [Name, Domain], Config),
  836:     {R2, 0} = ejabberdctl("registered_users", [Domain], Config),
  837:     %% then
  838:     nomatch = re:run(R2, ".*(" ++binary_to_list(Name)++").*").
  839: 
  840: register_twice(Config) ->
  841:     %% given
  842:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  843:     {Name,  Password} = {<<"tyler">>, <<"durden">>},
  844:     %% when
  845:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("register", [Name, Domain, Password], Config),
  846:     {R, Code} = ejabberdctl("register", [Name, Domain, Password], Config),
  847:     %% then
  848:     {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*(already registered).*"),
  849:     true = (Code =/= 0),
  850:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("unregister", [Name, Domain], Config).
  851: 
  852: 
  853: 
  854: backup_restore_mnesia(Config) ->
  855:     %% given
  856:     TableName = passwd,
  857:     TableSize = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]),
  858:     io:format("Table size is ~n~p~n", [TableSize]),
  859:     %% Table passwd should not be empty
  860:     FileName = "backup_mnesia.bup",
  861:     %% when
  862:     {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("backup", [FileName], Config),
  863:     nomatch = re:run(R, ".+"),
  864:     rpc_call(mnesia, clear_table, [TableName]),
  865:     0 = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]),
  866:     {R2, 0} = ejabberdctl("restore", [FileName], Config),
  867:     %% then
  868:     nomatch = re:run(R2, ".+"),
  869:     TableSize = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]).
  870: 
  871: restore_mnesia_wrong(Config) ->
  872:     FileName = "file that doesnt exist13123.bup",
  873:     {R2, _} = ejabberdctl("restore", [FileName], Config),
  874:     {match, Code} = re:run(R2, ".+"),
  875:     true = (Code =/= 0).
  876: 
  877: dump_and_load(Config) ->
  878:     FileName = "dump.bup",
  879:     TableName = passwd,
  880:     %% Table passwd should not be empty
  881:     TableSize = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]),
  882:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("dump", [FileName], Config),
  883:     rpc_call(mnesia, clear_table, [TableName]),
  884:     0 = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]),
  885:     {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("load", [FileName], Config),
  886:     {match, _} = re:run(R, ".+"),
  887:     TableSize = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]).
  888: 
  889: load_mnesia_wrong(Config) ->
  890:     FileName = "file that doesnt existRHCP.bup",
  891:     {R2, Code} = ejabberdctl("restore", [FileName], Config),
  892:     {match, _} = re:run(R2, ".+"),
  893:     true = (Code =/= 0).
  894: 
  895: dump_table(Config) ->
  896:     FileName = "dump.mn",
  897:     TableName = passwd,
  898:     %% Table passwd should not be empty
  899:     TableSize = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]),
  900:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("dump_table", [FileName, atom_to_list(TableName)], Config),
  901:     rpc_call(mnesia, clear_table, [TableName]),
  902:     0 = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]),
  903:     {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("load", [FileName], Config),
  904:     {match, _} = re:run(R, ".+"),
  905:     TableSize = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]).
  906: 
  907: get_loglevel(Config) ->
  908:     {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("get_loglevel", [], Config),
  909:     LogLevel = rpc_call(ejabberd_loglevel, get, []),
  910:     RegList = [io_lib:format("(.|\n|\r)*loglevel for ~p is ~p(.|\n|\r)*", [M, Lev]) || {M, {Lev, _}} <- LogLevel],
  911:     Regexp = lists:flatten(RegList),
  912:     Len = length(R),
  913:     {match, [{0, Len}]} = re:run(R, Regexp, [{capture, first}]).
  914: 
  915: remove_old_messages_test(Config) ->
  916:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(_) ->
  917:         %% given
  918:         JidA = nick_to_jid(alice, Config),
  919:         JidB = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
  920:         JidRecordAlice = rpc_call(jid, from_binary, [JidA]),
  921:         JidRecordBob = rpc_call(jid, from_binary, [JidB]),
  922:         Msg1 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(<<"bob@localhost">>, "Hi, how are you? Its old message!"),
  923:         Msg2 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(<<"bob@localhost">>, "Hello its new message!"),
  924:         OldTimestamp = fallback_timestamp(10, now()),
  925:         OfflineOld = generate_offline_message(JidRecordAlice, JidRecordBob, Msg1, OldTimestamp),
  926:         OfflineNew = generate_offline_message(JidRecordAlice, JidRecordBob, Msg2, now()),
  927:         {jid, _, _, _, LUser, LServer, _} = JidRecordBob,
  928:         rpc_call(mod_offline_backend, write_messages, [LUser, LServer, [OfflineOld, OfflineNew]]),
  929:         %% when
  930:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_old_messages", ["1"], Config),
  931:         {ok, SecondList} = rpc_call(mod_offline_backend, pop_messages, [LUser, LServer]),
  932:         %% then
  933:         1 = length(SecondList)
  934:     end).
  935: 
  936: remove_expired_messages_test(Config) ->
  937:     escalus:story(Config, [{mike, 1}], fun(_) ->
  938:         %% given
  939:         JidA = nick_to_jid(mike, Config),
  940:         JidB = nick_to_jid(kate, Config),
  941:         JidRecordMike = rpc_call(jid, from_binary, [JidA]),
  942:         JidRecordKate = rpc_call(jid, from_binary, [JidB]),
  943:         Msg1 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(<<"kate@localhost">>, "Rolling stones"),
  944:         Msg2 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(<<"kate@localhost">>, "Arctic monkeys!"),
  945:         Msg3 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(<<"kate@localhost">>, "More wine..."),
  946:         Msg4 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(<<"kate@localhost">>, "kings of leon"),
  947:         OldTimestamp = fallback_timestamp(10, now()),
  948:         ExpirationTime = fallback_timestamp(2, now()),
  949:         ExpirationTimeFuture= fallback_timestamp(-5, now()),
  950:         OfflineOld = generate_offline_expired_message(JidRecordMike, JidRecordKate, Msg1, OldTimestamp, ExpirationTime),
  951:         OfflineNow = generate_offline_expired_message(JidRecordMike, JidRecordKate, Msg2, now(), ExpirationTime),
  952:         OfflineFuture = generate_offline_expired_message(JidRecordMike, JidRecordKate, Msg3, now(), ExpirationTimeFuture),
  953:         OfflineFuture2 = generate_offline_expired_message(JidRecordMike, JidRecordKate, Msg4, OldTimestamp, ExpirationTimeFuture),
  954:         {jid, _, _, _, LUser, LServer, _} = JidRecordKate,
  955:         rpc_call(mod_offline_backend, write_messages, [LUser, LServer, [OfflineOld, OfflineNow, OfflineFuture, OfflineFuture2]]),
  956:         %% when
  957:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_expired_messages", [], Config),
  958:         {ok, SecondList} = rpc_call(mod_offline_backend, pop_messages, [LUser, LServer]),
  959:         %% then
  960:         2 = length(SecondList)
  961:     end).
  962: 
  963: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  964: %% Helpers
  965: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  966: 
  967: 
  968: nick_to_jid(UserName, Config) when is_atom(UserName) ->
  969:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, UserName),
  970:     escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_users:get_jid(Config, UserSpec)).
  971: 
  972: generate_offline_message(From, To, Msg, TimeStamp) ->
  973:     {jid, _, _, _, LUser, LServer, _} = To,
  974:     #offline_msg{us = {LUser, LServer}, timestamp = TimeStamp, expire = never, from = From, to = To, packet = Msg}.
  975: 
  976: generate_offline_expired_message(From, To, Msg, TimeStamp, ExpirationTime) ->
  977:     {jid, _, _, _, LUser, LServer, _} = To,
  978:     #offline_msg{us = {LUser, LServer}, timestamp = TimeStamp, expire = ExpirationTime, from = From, to = To, packet = Msg}.
  979: 
  980: 
  981: fallback_timestamp(Days, {MegaSecs, Secs, _MicroSecs}) ->
  982:     S = MegaSecs * 1000000 + Secs - 60 * 60 * 24 * Days,
  983:     MegaSecs1 = S div 1000000,
  984:     Secs1 = S rem 1000000,
  985:     {MegaSecs1, Secs1, 0}.
  986: 
  987: 
  988: start_mod_admin_extra() ->
  989:     Domain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  990:     ok = dynamic_modules:restart(Domain, mod_admin_extra, []).
  991: 
  992: get_user_data(User, Config) when is_atom(User) ->
  993:     get_user_data(escalus_users:get_options(Config, User, <<"newres">>), Config);
  994: get_user_data(User, _Config) ->
  995:     {_, Password} = lists:keyfind(password, 1, User),
  996:     {_, Username} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, User),
  997:     {_, Domain} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, User),
  998:     {Username, Domain, Password}.
  999: 
 1000: get_md5(AccountPass) ->
 1001:     lists:flatten([io_lib:format("~.16B", [X])
 1002:                    || X <- binary_to_list(crypto:hash(md5, AccountPass))]).
 1003: get_sha(AccountPass) ->
 1004:     lists:flatten([io_lib:format("~.16B", [X])
 1005:                    || X <- binary_to_list(crypto:hash(sha, AccountPass))]).
 1006: 
 1007: set_last(User, Domain, TStamp) ->
 1008:     Mod = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_admin_extra_last, get_lastactivity_module, [Domain]),
 1009:     Fun = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_admin_extra_last, get_lastactivity_fun, [Domain]),
 1010:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(Mod, Fun, [escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(User), Domain, TStamp, <<>>]).
 1011: 
 1012: delete_users(Config) ->
 1013:     Users = escalus_users:get_users([alice, bob, kate, mike]),
 1014:     lists:foreach(fun({_User, UserSpec}) ->
 1015:                 {Username, Domain, _Pass} = get_user_data(UserSpec, Config),
 1016:                 escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, remove_user, [Username, Domain])
 1017:         end, Users).
 1018: 
 1019: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1020: %% Predicates
 1021: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1022: 
 1023: match_user_status(Users, StatusTxt) ->
 1024:     Statuses = string:tokens(StatusTxt, "\n"),
 1025: 
 1026:     true = (length(Users) == length(Statuses)),
 1027:     match_user_status2(Users, Statuses).
 1028: 
 1029: match_user_status2([], _) ->
 1030:     true;
 1031: match_user_status2([User | UserR], Statuses) ->
 1032:     Username = binary_to_list(escalus_client:username(User)),
 1033:     Domain = binary_to_list(escalus_client:server(User)),
 1034:     Resource = binary_to_list(escalus_client:resource(User)),
 1035: 
 1036:     true = lists:any(fun(Status) ->
 1037:                 [Username, Domain, Resource]
 1038:                 =:=
 1039:                 lists:sublist(string:tokens(Status, "\t"), 1, 3)
 1040:         end, Statuses),
 1041:     match_user_status2(UserR, Statuses).
 1042: 
 1043: match_user_info(Users, UsersTxt) ->
 1044:     UsersInfo = string:tokens(UsersTxt, "\n"),
 1045: 
 1046:     true = (length(Users) == length(UsersInfo)),
 1047:     match_user_info2(Users, UsersInfo).
 1048: 
 1049: match_user_info2([], _) ->
 1050:     true;
 1051: match_user_info2([User | UserR], UsersInfo) ->
 1052:     Username = binary_to_list(escalus_client:username(User)),
 1053:     Domain = binary_to_list(escalus_client:server(User)),
 1054:     Resource = binary_to_list(escalus_client:resource(User)),
 1055:     FullJID = Username ++ "@" ++ Domain ++ "/" ++ Resource,
 1056: 
 1057:     true = lists:any(fun(UserInfo) ->
 1058:                 string:str(UserInfo, string:to_lower(FullJID)) =:= 1
 1059:         end, UsersInfo),
 1060:     match_user_info2(UserR, UsersInfo).
 1061: 
 1062: match_roster(ItemsValid, Items) ->
 1063:     ItemsTokens = [ string:tokens(ItemToken, "\t") || ItemToken <- string:tokens(Items, "\n") ],
 1064: 
 1065:     true = (length(ItemsValid) == length(ItemsTokens)),
 1066:     true = lists:all(fun({Username, Domain, Nick, Group, Sub}) ->
 1067:                     JID = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(<<Username/binary, "@", Domain/binary >>),
 1068:                     lists:any(fun
 1069:                                 ([RosterJID, Nick, Sub, "none", Group]) ->
 1070:                                     JID =:= escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(list_to_binary(RosterJID));
 1071:                                 (_) ->
 1072:                                     false
 1073:                               end, ItemsTokens)
 1074:             end, ItemsValid).
 1075: 
 1076: string_to_binary(List) ->
 1077:     case erlang:system_info(otp_release) of
 1078:         [$R|_] ->
 1079:             list_to_binary(List);
 1080:         _ ->
 1081:             unicode:characters_to_binary(List)
 1082:     end.
